titles.title: A bill to prohibit any charges on telephone bills for calls to 800 nunbers.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S14510-14511)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce.

bill.summary: 10/6/1994--Introduced. Amends the Communications Act of 1934 to prohibit a calling party from being charged for a call to, or information provided by, an 800 number by means of a charge included on, or transmitted with, a bill for telephone exchange service or telephone toll service.
